summary: Highly motivated, team-oriented professional with achievements in management, employee/customer relations, program implementations, training, and employee development. Recognized for leadership, effective communication, and strong work ethic.

experience.title: General Manager/Fitness Director
experience.description: Manages and supervises approximately 30 fitness club employees. Implements and creates fitness/wellness programs; conducts assessments and offers recommendations for healthier lifestyles; mentors and develops personal training and group fitness programs; coordinates facility repairs/maintenance and equipment procurement; assists in budgeting, planning, and event execution; collaborates with sales/marketing to drive promotions.

experience.title: Assistant Manager / Educator
experience.description: Floor Manager and Educator on the retail floor; educated guests on product, community, and culture; events liaison coordinating in Metro Atlanta; managed manager checklist deliverables; developed daily/weekly/monthly revenue strategies; represented store at meetings; coached Educators & Key Leaders; conducted personnel reviews.

experience.title: General Manager
experience.description: Supervised 13 personnel across club operations; provided guidance, training, and motivation; conducted regular staff meetings; managed budget and revenue; supported member recruitment and sales activities; ensured proper payroll processing and adherence to corporate standards.

experience.title: Fitness Coordinator
experience.description: Coordinated group exercise programs for ~600 employees; supervised 3 Fitness Specialists; created monthly schedules; oversaw internships; produced company-wide monthly newsletter and weekly fitness tips; delivered health/fitness/wellness presentations.

experience.title: Owner / Instructor
experience.description: Owned and operated an aerobic studio offering 8â€“10 fitness classes daily; managed a staff of 5 instructors; handled general maintenance and marketing; managed an annual budget of $45K.

experience.title: Wellness Director & Aerobic Coordinator
experience.description: Managed Wellness Department (~30 employees); oversaw 30 group fitness classes and 25+ fitness assessments; prepared annual budget of $230K; payroll and staff development; coordinated facility repairs and equipment procurement; led member appreciation initiatives; received Character Development Award in 2002.

experience.title: Corporate Fitness Manager/Director
experience.description: Implemented and coordinated group exercise programs and wellness activities for 25+ corporations/universities; supervised 325+ group fitness classes/week, 120 Exercise Leaders, and 4 Area Directors; managed payroll >$300K and audits; led recruiting, advertising, and marketing efforts.

experience.title: Club Manager / Fitness Coordinator
experience.description: Established member relations from sales to member services; taught ~6 aerobic classes; implemented instructor/member training programs; oversaw club appearance and maintenance; managed daily sales log and payrolls.
